title: Nomad has excessive leadership losses
description: Clusters can experience leadership changes or shifts in their distributed consensus protocol. This monitor tracks the number of leadership changes in the Nomad cluster to indicate instability within the cluster.

definition.message:
Nomad has excessive leadership losses.
** This monitor relies on a sparse metric which can be hard to resolve, it will therefore automatically expire after 1 hour **
Documentation: [Nomad Runbook](https://hashicorp.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/CLOUD/pages/690028745/Nomad+experiencing+excessive+leader+elections)
definition.name: [Nomad] Excessive Leadership Losses
